Note: If you see the ngrok warning screen, use one of these methods:

Method 1: Direct Legacy Access

Add /legacy.html to your ngrok URL:

Open Legacy Version

Method 2: Custom User-Agent

Set your browser's User-Agent to something custom (like "TotallyNotSpyware/2.0")

Method 3: Use Safari on iOS

iOS Safari often bypasses ngrok warnings automatically

Method 4: Add to Home Screen

On iOS, try adding the PWA to home screen - this can bypass warnings
